attributes.action: PUBLIC VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE AGAINST the decision to further AIRSTRIKES in Syria
attributes.background: It has been voted in the House of Commons ONLY by Members of Parliament whether or not we should carry out airstrikes in Syria. A vast number of the public including myself believe that not only should we have a direct say, but we call a VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE against the decision made.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a referendum on this decision, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/113150
